description: Metrics about the MQ Appliance hardware

panels.description: The current local date and time on the applianc.
panels.title: Date/Time

panels.description: The name of the time zone currently in effect.
panels.title: Timezone

panels.description: The total amount of time the appliance has been up since the last reload or reboot. Note that a shutdown and reload resets this counter.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: The total amount of time since the last reboot. Note that this counter is reset by a shutdown and reboot, but not by a shutdown and reload.
panels.title: Boot Up Time

panels.description: The number of times the firmware image was restarted through an appliance reboot or a firmware reload. The count is from the initial firmware load on the appliance till the current time. The count is independent of firmware version.
panels.title: Boot Count

panels.description: The type of the firmware installation type. Can be primary or secondary. The secondary firmware image is used when rolling back the firmware.
panels.title: Type

panels.description: The version of this firmware image.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: The level of the firmware.
panels.title: Level

panels.description: Delivery type of the firmware.
panels.title: Delivery Type

panels.description: The specific build of the firmware image.
panels.title: Build

panels.description: Date of the firmware build.
panels.title: Build Date

panels.description: Date that the firmware was installed.
panels.title: Install Date

panels.description: The serial number of the appliance. This number is unique to each appliance.
panels.title: Serial #

panels.description: The IBM machine type of the appliance.
panels.title: Machine Type

panels.description: The IBM model type of the appliance.
panels.title: Model Type

panels.description: Current total CPU usage on the appliance
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: CPU load average for 1, 5 and 15 minutes
panels.title: CPU Load Avg

panels.description: CPU temperatures over time
panels.title: CPU Temperatures

panels.description: Total number of existing failure notifications.
panels.title: Failures

panels.description: Failures that have been notified.
panels.title: Failure Notifications

panels.description: RPM for fan 1
panels.title: Fan 1 RPM

panels.description: RPM for fan 2
panels.title: Fan 2 RPM

panels.description: RPM for fan 3
panels.title: Fan 3 RPM

panels.description: List of log targets currently in use.
panels.title: Log Targets

panels.description: Rate of log targets events processed.
panels.title: Events Processed Rate

panels.description: Memory percentage currently in use
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Total memory available on the appliance
panels.title: Total Memory

panels.description: Amount of memory currently being used on the appliance
panels.title: Used Memory

panels.description: Amount of memory currently available on the appliance
panels.title: Free Memory

panels.description: Status of all network interfaces.
panels.title: Network Interfaces Status

panels.description: Receive rate for all interfaces
panels.title: RX Bytes Rate

panels.description: Transmit rate for all interfaces
panels.title: TX Bytes Rate

panels.description: Number of TCP connections established
panels.title: TCP Established

panels.description: Number of TCP listeners currently active
panels.title: TCP Listening

panels.description: List of queue managers currently using the appliance.
panels.title: Queue Managers

panels.description: CPU usage for all queue managers.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage for all queue managers.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: File system usage for all queue managers.
panels.title: File System Usage

panels.description: First SSD drive serial number
panels.title: SSD #1

panels.description: Amount of data in bytes written to the SSD since manufacturing
panels.title: Data Written

panels.description: Life left in percent for the SSD
panels.title: Life Left

panels.description: Third SSD drive serial number
panels.title: SSD #3

panels.description: Amount of data in bytes written to the SSD since manufacturing
panels.title: Data Written

panels.description: Life left in percent for the SSD
panels.title: Life Left

panels.description: Second SSD drive serial number
panels.title: SSD #2

panels.description: Amount of data in bytes written to the SSD since manufacturing
panels.title: Data Written

panels.description: Life left in percent for the SSD
panels.title: Life Left

panels.description: Fourth SSD drive serial number
panels.title: SSD #4

panels.description: Amount of data in bytes written to the SSD since manufacturing
panels.title: Data Written

panels.description: Life left in percent for the SSD
panels.title: Life Left

panels.description: Percentage of encrypted storage currently in use
panels.title: Encrypted

panels.description: Total encrypted storage available
panels.title: Total Encrypted

panels.description: Free encrypted storage available
panels.title: Free Encrypted

panels.description: Percentage of temporary storage currently in use
panels.title: Temporary

panels.description: Total temporary storage available
panels.title: Total Temporary

panels.description: Free temporary storage available
panels.title: Freel Temporary

panels.description: Percentage of internal storage currently in use
panels.title: Internal

panels.description: Total internal storage available
panels.title: Total Internal

panels.description: Free internal storage available
panels.title: Free Internal

panels.description: Percentage of storage for MQ Data currently in use
panels.title: MQ Data

panels.description: Total storage for MQ Data currently allocated
panels.title: Total MQ Data

panels.description: Total storage for MQ Data currently in use
panels.title: Used MQ Data

panels.description: Amount of storage for MQ Data currently free
panels.title: Free MQ Data

panels.description: Percentage of storage for MQ Errors currently in use
panels.title: MQ Errors

panels.description: Total storage for MQ Errors currently allocated
panels.title: Total MQ Errors

panels.description: Total storage for MQ Errors currently allocated
panels.title: Used MQ Errors

panels.description: Amount of storage for MQ Errors currently free
panels.title: Free MQ Errors

panels.description: Percentage of storage for MQ Trace currently in use
panels.title: MQ Trace

panels.description: Total storage for MQ Trace currently allocated
panels.title: Total MQ Trace

panels.description: Amount of storage for MQ Trace currently in use
panels.title: Used MQ Trace

panels.description: Amount of storage for MQ Trace currently free
panels.title: Free MQ trace

panels.description: Total number of users connected to the appliance, not counting any MQ users.
panels.title: Total Active Users

panels.description: Active users based on their connection type, including SSH, Web UI, REST API, etc...
panels.title: Active Users per Connection Types

title: MQ Appliance - Main
